title: Supplementary tables: 2019 UK greenhouse gas emissions by Standard Industrial Classification
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description:
This publication provides the final estimates of UK territorial greenhouse gas emissions going back to 1990. Estimates are presented by source in February of each year. They are updated each year:
in March, to include estimates by end-user and fuel type:
in June, to include estimates by Standard Industrial Classification (SIC).
Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to contents click the most recent date, this will display a link , click the link this will open another page, scroll down to "Documents" and the data can be found in XLS and ODS

Estimated territorial emissions type.description: territorial emissions, meaning emissions that occur within the UK's borders, and are reported on a source basis

sizingNotes: Number of tabs with largish tables but simple table structure and little footnotes.
notes: Note this dataset is supplement to "Final UK greenhouse gas emissions national statistics" dataset above. Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
